title: Can Someone Help ME Does Fiora's W blocks Wukong's Q and E and R?
body: Today i had a game, i was playing as Fiora. I was against Wukong in the top lane, everytime he goes for the e q auto combo, i tried to parry it but i find out is that it doesn't block it. Thus, every time he ult me i parry it so he got stunned, i parried the first hit. The next hit from Wukong's Q i got knocked up again which means that his ult really has no counter play. Unless i was Shaco, can anyone help me? My team is calling me feeders, and i'm really tilted about this thing, because it means that i can never get better at Fiora.

replies.body: Although you parried his ult, his ult will still continue, so the other instance of damage will still knock you up, since it hasn't knocked you up yet.

It should block it, your probably timing it wrong, you got like half a second to block dmg n stuff.
The rest of the animation is doing dmg.
